title: Hello World
headline: VRtualis has entered the lobby
body: VRtualis has officialy started, and is ready to serve the NeosVR community as a large freelanceing and volenteer community! Talented Logix Wizards, Enviromental Artists, and Modeling Artists are ready to help new uers and veteran players alike, from learning how the game works to building the next big project, together VRtualis is here to help build the Metaverse of Tomorrow!
